Player History
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 6/12/1966 (Going to CIN: P J. Miller, P R. Craig. Going to NYM: 2B H. Yamazaki, P D. Sutherland)...
Injured on 9/10/1968 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 10 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/1969 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/1972 to a 5-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Injured on 5/6/1973 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
